name: Drakengard Final Boss Practice
description:
Getting your ass kicked by the last burst of attacks from the final boss in Drakengard 1? Me too. I made this so that I could practice the pattern without having to do 2 minutes of easy stuff every time.

Z to fire light circles, X to fire dark circles. If you download the executable versions, you can use a controller, but you'll probably need to use the X and O buttons.
